person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Officials said the New Mexico Activities Association decided to bar Cito from any inter-scholastic competition until next October , regardless of the school he attends .

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Person":

1. Cito - The person whose participation in inter-scholastic competition has been barred by the New Mexico Activities Association.
2. Officials - The individuals who made the decision to bar Cito from any inter-scholastic competition.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

Sure, my apologies for including irrelevant entities in my previous response. Here are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to a "Person":

1. Cito - The person whose participation in inter-scholastic competition has been barred by the New Mexico Activities Association.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to a "Person":

| Person |
| --- |
| Cito |
